tool_description: MMO Games API - By MMOBomb! Access programmatically the best Multiplayer Online Games,  News and Giveaways!
name: MMO Games
title: MMO Games

api_list.name: Return details from a specific game
Latest MMO News
api_list.description: Latest MMO News powered by MMOBomb.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mmo-games.p.rapidapi.com/latestnews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mmo-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filter Games by multiple tags
api_list.description: Filter Games by multiple tags for personalized results. Insert tag, eg: mmorpg, shooter, pvp, mmofps and more at [https://www.mmobomb.com/api ](url). Optionally you can also use the "platform" and "sort" parameters

api_list.name: Games by platform & category & sorted
Sort Games
api_list.description: Sort games by release date, alphabetical, popularity or relevance

api_list.name: Games by category or tag
api_list.description: Insert game category or tag, eg: mmorpg, shooter, pvp, mmofps and more. Full tag list at [https://www.mmobomb.com/api](url)

api_list.name: Games by Platform
api_list.description: Insert platform, eg: pc, browser or all

api_list.name: Games list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mmo-games.p.rapidapi.com/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mmo-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
